attacks.name: Energy Shower
attacks.text: Attach any number of basic Energy cards from your hand to your Pokémon in any way you like.

attacks.name: Rainbow Burn
attacks.text: Does 30 damage plus 10 more damage for each type of basic Energy card attached to Flygon.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.text: As long as Flygon has any Energy attached to it, the Retreat Cost for Flygon is 0.

attacks.name: Sand Pit
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

data.name: Flygon

abilities.name: Irritating Buzz
abilities.text: As long as Flygon is your Active Pokémon, put 1 damage counter on each of your opponent's Active Pokémon between turns, excluding Fighting Pokémon.

attacks.name: Sand Sonic
attacks.text: If you attach a Fighting Energy card from your hand to Flygon during this turn, this attack does 60 damage plus 20 more damage.

data.flavorText: It whips up sandstorms with powerful flaps of its wings. It is known as "The Desert Spirit."

data.name: Flygon δ
rules: This Pokémon is both Grass Metal type.

abilities.name: Delta Supply
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may attach a basic Energy card or a δ Rainbow Energy card from your hand to 1 of your Pokémon that has δ on its card. This power can't be used if Flygon is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Swift
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, Poké-Powers, Poké-Bodies, or any other effects on the Defending Pokémon.

abilities.name: Rainbow Float
abilities.text: If any basic Energy card attached to Flygon is the same type as any of your Pokémon, the Retreat Cost for those Pokémon is 0.

attacks.name: Sand Wall
attacks.text: Discard a Stadium card your opponent has in play. If you do, prevent all effects of an attack, including damage, done to Flygon during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Power Swing
attacks.text: Does 60 damage plus 10 more damage for each Evolved Pokémon on your Bench.

abilities.name: Sand Guard
abilities.text: Whenever Flygon would be damaged by your opponent's attack (after applying Weakness and Resistance), flip a coin. If heads, reduce that damage by 20.

attacks.name: Air Slash
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, discard an Energy card attached to Flygon.

attacks.name: Sand Pit
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon can't retreat until the end of your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Dragonbreath
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed. If tails, this attack does nothing.

data.name: Flygon

abilities.name: Dragon Guard
abilities.text: Prevent all effects of your opponent's attacks, except damage, done to your Dragon Pokémon. (Existing effects are not removed.)

attacks.name: Sand Tomb
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

data.flavorText: This Pokémon hides in the heart of sandstorms it creates and seldom appears where people can see it.

data.name: Flygon

abilities.name: Sand Slammer
abilities.text: At any time between turns, if this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon, put 1 damage counter on each of your opponent's Pokémon.

attacks.name: Flying Beatdown
attacks.text: You may discard a Grass Energy and a Fighting Energy attached to this Pokémon. If you do, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

data.flavorText: Known as "The Desert Spirit," this Pokémon hides in the sandstorms it causes by beating its wings.

data.name: Flygon-EX
rules: Pokémon-EX rule: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

abilities.name: Voice of the Sands
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon, you may have your opponent switch his or her Active Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Spiral Buzz
attacks.text: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 30 more damage for each heads.

data.name: Flygon ex
rules: When Pokémon-ex has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

abilities.name: Emerge Charge
abilities.text: Once during your turn, when you play Flygon ex from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon, you may search your discard pile for up to 2 Energy cards and attach them to Flygon ex.

attacks.name: Reactive Blast
attacks.text: You may discard any number of React Energy cards attached to Flygon ex. If you do, this attack does 40 damage plus 30 more damage for each Energy card you discarded.

data.name: Flygon

attacks.name: Rainbow Shower
attacks.text: Attach as many basic Energy cards as you like from your hand to your Pokémon in any way you like.

attacks.name: Sand Sweep
attacks.text: Heal 30 damage from each of your Pokémon that has any Energy attached to it.

data.flavorText: It hides itself by kicking up desert sand with its wings. Red covers shield its eyes from sand.

data.name: Flygon

abilities.name: Sand Slammer
abilities.text: At any time between turns, if this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon, put 1 damage counter on each of your opponent's Pokémon.

attacks.name: Flying Beatdown
attacks.text: You may discard a Grass Energy and a Fighting Energy attached to this Pokémon. If you do, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

data.flavorText: Known as "The Desert Spirit" this Pokémon hides in the sandstorms it causes by beating its wings.

data.name: Flygon

abilities.name: Labyrinth of Sand
abilities.text: As long as this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, your opponent's Active Pokémon can't retreat.

attacks.name: Desert Geyser
attacks.text: If your opponent has a Stadium in play, discard it. If you discarded a Stadium in this way, during your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage from and effects of attacks done to this Pokémon.

data.flavorText: This Pokémon hides in the heart of sandstorms it creates and seldom appears where people can see it.

data.name: Flygon ex
rules: When Pokémon-ex has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

abilities.name: Psychic Protector
abilities.text: If Flygon ex is damaged by an opponent's attack, you may discard up to 4 cards from your hand. If you do, any damage done to Flygon ex is reduced by 10 for each card you discarded.

attacks.name: Slashing Strike
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, Flygon ex can't use Slashing Strike during your next turn.

data.name: Flygon LV.X
rules: Put this card onto your Active Flygon. Flygon LV.X can use any attack, Poké-Power, or Poké-Body from its previous level.

abilities.name: Wind Erosion
abilities.text: As long as Flygon is your Active Pokémon, discard the top card from your opponent's deck between turns.

attacks.name: Extreme Attack
attacks.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon LV.X. This attack does 150 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon).

data.name: Flygon ex δ
rules: When Pokémon-ex has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

abilities.name: Sand Damage
abilities.text: As long as Flygon ex is your Active Pokémon, put 1 damage counter on each of your opponent's Benched Basic Pokémon between turns. You can't use more than 1 Sand Damage Poké-Body between turns.

attacks.name: Psychic Pulse
attacks.text: Does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon that has any damage counters on it. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

data.name: Flygon

abilities.name: Sand Flap
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may choose either player. That player shuffles his or her hand into his or her deck and draws 4 cards.

attacks.name: Sand Tomb
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

data.flavorText: Known as "The Desert Spirit," this Pokémon hides in the sandstorms it causes by beating its wings.

data.name: Flygon-GX
rules: Pokémon-GX rule: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

abilities.name: Dusty Defense
abilities.text: As long as this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon, all of your Pokémon take 30 less damage from your opponent's attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Desert Hurricane
attacks.text: If there is any Stadium card in play, this attack does 120 more damage. Then, discard that Stadium card.

attacks.name: Sonic Edge-GX
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by any effects on your opponent's Active Pokémon. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

data.name: Flygon-GX
rules: Pokémon-GX rule: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

abilities.name: Dusty Defense
abilities.text: As long as this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon, all of your Pokémon take 30 less damage from your opponent's attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Desert Hurricane
attacks.text: If there is any Stadium card in play, this attack does 120 more damage. Then, discard that Stadium card.

attacks.name: Sonic Edge-GX
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by any effects on your opponent's Active Pokémon. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.text: If there is any Stadium card in play, this attack does 120 more damage. Then, discard that Stadium card.

attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by any effects on your opponent's Active Pokémon. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

data.name: Flygon

attacks.name: Desert Pillar
attacks.text: This attack does 50 damage for each Colorless in your opponent's Active Pokémon's Retreat Cost.

data.flavorText: This Pokémon hides in the heart of sandstorms it creates and seldom appears where people can see it.

data.name: Flygon V
rules: V rule: When your Pokémon V is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Draconic Impulse
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a Pokémon VMAX, this attack does 160 more damage, and discard 3 Energy from this Pokémon.

data.name: Flygon V
rules: V rule: When your Pokémon V is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Draconic Impulse
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a Pokémon VMAX, this attack does 160 more damage, and discard 3 Energy from this Pokémon.

data.name: Flygon ex
rules: Pokémon ex rule: When your Pokémon ex is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
Tera: As long as this Pokémon is on your Bench, prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks (both yours and your opponent's).

attacks.name: Reversing Storm
attacks.text: You may switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Sonic Peridot
attacks.text: This attack does 100 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon ex and Pokémon V. This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance.

data.name: Flygon ex
rules: Pokémon ex rule: When your Pokémon ex is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
Tera: As long as this Pokémon is on your Bench, prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks (both yours and your opponent's).

attacks.text: You may switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Sonic Peridot
attacks.text: This attack does 100 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon ex and Pokémon V. This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance.

data.name: Flygon

abilities.name: Sandy Flapping
abilities.text: Once during your turn, when you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon, you may use this Ability. You may also use this Ability if this Pokémon is in the Active Spot and is Knocked Out by damage from an attack from your opponent's Pokémon. Discard the top 2 cards of your opponent's deck.

data.flavorText: Known as the Desert Spirit, this Pokémon hides in the sandstorms it causes by beating its wings.
